# holdCall()

**Instance Method**

Places all active calls on hold and accepts a held or waiting call.

## Declaration

```swift
func holdCall()
```

## Holding Calls

- **addHeldCall()**: Adds held calls to the current conversation.
- **placeAllOthers(onHold:)**: Places all calls except the call with the specified index on hold.
